def.dt: :to find (a number, answer, etc.) by using mathematical processes calculate the volume of a cylinder calculate mass/area/distance/speed I need to calculate how long it will take me to drive to Chicago. We calculated the cost of new carpeting for the whole house.
:to get a general idea about the value, size, or cost of (something) :estimate We need to calculate our chances of success before we invest more money in the business.
